hanzi-su-wiki:
虹

Значения

Радуга

Мнемоника

Добрый небесный дракон похож на червяка 虫. Посылает на землю благодатный дождь. Радуга — след от его работы 工 по созданию небесной арки.

purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 工 indicates the sound; 虫 (insect) conveys the meaning.

霓虹灯 [ ní hóng dēng ]: neon lamp (loanword)

heisig_chinese_memo: Little is it known that a rainbow is actually created by the work of insects of different colours flying in formation, a craft they have perfected to create the rainbows we see today.
koohiiStory1: Little is it known that a rainbow is actually created by insects of different colours flying in formation, a craft they have perfected to create the rainbows we see today.
koohiiStory2: Rainbow is of course created by billions of colored insects (what? you really thought it was an optical illusion?). However I had problems remembering that the insect primitive goes on the left. If you have similar difficulties, try this: rainbow is an Insect-Craft. Mnemonic: I.C. Rainbow (I see rainbow).
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: An insect specializing in construction builds a rainbow. Did you ever wonder where rainbows come from? Construction insects build them. Construction insects build rainbows.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine this insect with a construction hat on, building a rainbow. He works very fast. The resulting rainbow is beautiful!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This rainbow building insect is so needy (にじ). He is needy because he needs everyone to look at his rainbow and praise him for what he’s done. “Look at my rainbow! Look at how good it is and I am! I’m so needy! Needy for praise and recognition!”
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine this construction insect being all whiny and needy for attention and stuff. It’s pathetic. Hear him whine and whine because of how needy he is.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the insect (虫) works (工) to make a rainbow
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Little is it known that a rainbow is actually created by the work of insects of different colours flying in formation, a craft they have perfected to create the rainbows we see today.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle is like an arched rainbow in the sky. The ancients believed that the rainbow was a living monster with two heads. Later, it was changed from " Chong " to "工" sound.

The ancients believed that the rainbow on the stream was like a water-drinking creature, so the term "drinking the rainbow" was used. "Shan Hai Jing. "Overseas Eastern Classics": "In the north, there are two poems each." Hao Yixing Shu: "There are two poems in the rainbow, you can drink the stream, and you can see them." Wang Bao "Xuanpu Junchi Lin Fanfenghe" : "The stone wall is like a mirror, flying bridges drink rainbows."

After the Warring States period, the ancients divided the " rainbow " into male and female categories. Red on the outside and purple on the inside. The bright red is called "male rainbow" or "zhengxiong"; the red is inside, purple on the outside, and the lighter color is called " "Fuhong" or "female rainbow".

The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the original meaning, and "Compilation" 10405 reverses: "㞢(有) comes from the north from the rainbow and drinks in the river."

"Said Wen": "Rainbow, 螮蝀也. It looks like a worm. From the insect, the sound of work. "Mingtang" and "Yueling" said: "The rainbow begins to see." "Guo Moruo thinks that the " rainbow " is called the "smoke" because the rainbow is shaped like a ribbon.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle is like an arched rainbow in the sky. The ancients believed that the rainbow was a living monster with two heads.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文象天上一道拱形的彩虹。古人認為虹是有生命的怪物，有兩個頭。後來改為從「虫」，「工」聲的形聲字。

　　古人認為溪澗上的彩虹象飲水的生物，故有「飲虹」一語。《山海經．海外東經》：「𧈫𧈫在其北，各有兩首。」郝懿行疏：「虹有兩首，能飲澗水，山行者或見之。」王褒〈玄圃濬池临泛奉和〉：「石壁如明鏡，飛橋類飲虹。」

　　戰國以後，古人又把「虹」分為雌雄兩類，紅色在外，紫色在內，顏色鮮紅的稱為「雄虹」或「正雄」；紅色在內，紫色在外，顏色較淡的稱為「副虹」或「雌虹」。

　　甲骨文用作本義，《合集》10405反：「㞢(有)出虹自北，飲于河。」

　　《說文》：「虹，螮蝀也。狀似蟲。从虫，工聲。〈明堂〉、〈月令〉曰：『虹始見』。𧌫，籒文虹从申。申，電也。」郭沫若認為「虹」稱為「螮蝀」，因為彩虹的形狀像絲帶。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文象天上一道拱形的彩虹。古人認為虹是有生命的怪物，有兩個頭。

虹(にじ): rainbow

甲骨文象天上一道拱形的彩虹。古人認為虹是有生命的怪物，有兩個頭。後來改為從「 虫 」，「 工 」聲的形聲字。 古人認為溪澗上的彩虹象飲水的生物，故有「飲虹」一語。《山海經．海外東經》：「𧈫𧈫在其北，各有兩首。」郝懿行疏：「虹有兩首，能飲澗水，山行者或見之。」王褒〈玄圃濬池临泛奉和〉：「石壁如明鏡，飛橋類飲虹。」 戰國以後，古人又把「 虹 」分為雌雄兩類，紅色在外，紫色在內，顏色鮮紅的稱為「雄虹」或「正雄」；紅色在內，紫色在外，顏色較淡的稱為「副虹」或「雌虹」。 甲骨文用作本義，《合集》10405反：「㞢(有)出虹自北，飲于河。」 《說文》：「虹，螮蝀也。狀似蟲。从虫，工聲。〈明堂〉、〈月令〉曰：『虹始見』。𧌫，籒文虹从申。申，電也。」郭沫若認為「 虹 」稱為「螮蝀」，因為彩虹的形狀像絲帶。
Oracle is like an arched rainbow in the sky. The ancients believed that the rainbow was a living monster with two heads. Later, it was changed from " Chong" to " 工" sound. The ancients believed that the rainbow on the stream was like a water-drinking creature, so the term "drinking the rainbow" was used. "Shan Hai Jing. "Overseas Eastern Classics": "In the north, there are two poems each." Hao Yixing Shu: "There are two poems in the rainbow, you can drink the stream, and you can see them." Wang Bao "Xuanpu Junchi Lin Fanfenghe" : "The stone wall is like a mirror, flying bridges drink rainbows." After the Warring States period, the ancients divided the " rainbow" into male and female categories. Red on the outside and purple on the inside. The bright red is called "male rainbow" or "zhengxiong"; the red is inside, purple on the outside, and the lighter color is called " "Fuhong" or "female rainbow". The oracle bone inscriptions are used as the original meaning, and "Compilation" 10405 reverses: "㞢(有) comes from the north from the rainbow and drinks in the river." "Said Wen": "Rainbow, 螮蝀也. It looks like a worm. From the insect, the sound of work. "Mingtang" and "Yueling" said: "The rainbow begins to see." "Guo Moruo thinks that the " rainbow" is called the "smoke" because the rainbow is shaped like a ribbon.

虹字的基本解释

虹
hóng
雨后天空中出现的彩色圆弧，有红、橙、黄、绿、蓝、靛、紫七种颜色。是大气中的小水珠经日光照射发生折射和反射作用而形成的，出现在和太阳相对着的方向。
指桥（因形似虹）：虹桥（中国古代的一种木拱桥。外形如长虹贯空。亦称“飞桥”）。断虹。长虹卧波。

虹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户公切，平東，匣。］
［《廣韻》古巷切，去絳，見。］
(1)大气中一种光的现象。天空中的小水珠经日光照射发生折射和反射作用而形成的圆弧形彩带，呈现红、橙、黄、绿、蓝、靛、紫七种颜色。这种圆弧常出现两个，红色在外，紫色在内，颜色鲜红的称“虹”，也称正（雄）虹；红色在内，紫色在外，颜色较淡的称“霓”，也称副（雌）虹。
(2)桥的代称。
(3)用作量词。
(4)借指彩旗。
(5)通“訌”。惑乱。
[②]［hòng］
［《集韻》胡貢切，去送，匣。］
(1)见“虹2洞”。
(2)溃败。
[③]［gòng］
［《廣韻》古送切，去送，見。］
古县名。治所在今安徽省五河县西。

◎ 虹
rainbow

虹字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　虹； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1076第40
【唐韻】戸公切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡公切，?音洪。【說文】螮蝀也。【禮·月令】季春，虹始見。孟冬，虹藏不見。【淮南子·說山訓】天二氣則成虹。【後漢·郞覬傳】凡日旁氣色白而純者，名爲虹。　又【字彙補】宛虹，龍也。　又草名。【拾遺記】背明國有虹草，花似朝虹之色。　又劒名。【魏文帝序】造百辟寶劒三，其一曰流彩虹。　又【集韻】【正韻】?胡江切，音降。與訌同。潰亂。一曰爭訟相陷入之言也。【爾雅·釋言】虹，潰也。【詩·大雅】彼童而角，實虹小子。　又【廣韻】古巷切，音絳。【元稹·送客遊嶺南詩】山頭虹似巾。　又縣名，在泗州。【後漢·郡國志】沛國虹。　又【集韻】古送切，音貢。義同。　又胡貢切，音鬨。虹洞，相連也。【枚乗·七發】虹洞兮蒼天。【馬融·廣成頌】天地虹洞。　又【韻補】戸孔切，音汞。【郭璞·鯨魚贊】壯士挺劒，氣激白虹。鯨魚潛淵，出而色悚。　【玉篇】籀文作?。

虹字的源字形

虹字的起名意思

：虹是指雨后天空中出现的彩色圆弧，有红、橙、黄、绿、蓝、靛、紫七种颜色，鲜艳美丽。虹比作美人。

rainbow
Basic explanation of words
rainbow
hóng
The colorful arcs that appear in the sky after the rain are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and purple. It is formed by the refraction and reflection of small water droplets in the atmosphere by sunlight, and they appear in the direction opposite to the sun.
Refers to the bridge (because it looks like a rainbow): Hongqiao (a wooden arch bridge in ancient China. The shape is like a long rainbow through the sky. Also known as "flying bridge"). Broken rainbow. Changhong lying wave.
rainbow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xie. ]
["Guangyun" ancient alley cut, go to Jiang, see you. ]
(1) A phenomenon of light in the atmosphere. The arc-shaped ribbons formed by the refraction and reflection of the small water droplets in the sky are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and purple. There are often two such arcs, red on the outside and purple on the inside. The bright red one is called "Rainbow", also known as the positive (male) rainbow; the red on the inside, purple on the outside, and the lighter color is called "Neon", also called "Neon". Vice (female) rainbow.
(2) The name of the bridge.
(3) Used as a quantifier.
(4) By means of colorful flags.
(5) Through "fight". Confused.
[②]［hòng］
["Jiyun" Hu Gongqie, go to send, box. ]
(1) See "Hong 2 Hole".
(2) Rout.
[③]［gòng］
["Guangyun" ancient delivery cut, go to deliver, see you. ]
Ancient county name. It was governed in the west of Wuhe County, Anhui Province.
rainbow

One said that the disputes are falling into words. 【Erya·Interpretation】The rainbow is broken. 【Poetry·Daya】Bi Tong Er Jiao, Shi Hong boy.　[Guangyun] The ancient alleys are cut, the sound is crimson. [Yuan Zhen·Lingnan Poems for Sending Off the Guest] The rainbow on the top of the mountain is like a scarf.　 Also the name of the county, in Sizhou. rainbow
Source glyph
rainbow
Name meaning
: Rainbow refers to the colorful arcs that appear in the sky after the rain. There are seven colors of red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and purple, which are bright and beautiful. The rainbow is likened to a beauty.

hóng
1) радуга; радужный, многоцветный
2) арка
Radicals: 虫, 工  (insect, construction)
Meaning Mnemonic
An insect specializing in construction builds a rainbow. Did you ever wonder where rainbows come from? Construction insects build them. Construction insects build rainbows.
Imagine this insect with a construction hat on, building a rainbow. He works very fast. The resulting rainbow is beautiful!
Reading Mnemonic
This rainbow building insect is so needy (にじ). He is needy because he needs everyone to look at his rainbow and praise him for what he’s done. “Look at my rainbow! Look at how good it is and I am! I’m so needy! Needy for praise and recognition!”
Imagine this construction insect being all whiny and needy for attention and stuff. It’s pathetic. Hear him whine and whine because of how needy he is.
